WorkItem.Description: A downloader with datagridview for showing downloads and their informations.                vb.net

Comments.Message:
Hi all,
 Could you give me detailed scenario about this sample idea? I hope one of you can response to me again. Thank in advanced.

Sincerely,
All-In-OneCode-Framework

Hi all,
 I have submitted it as a new sample idea,but the reply of this sample idea has a problem that its thread manager is more important than other feature. Because we already have a WebDownloader sample that demonstrate Pause/Resume/Cancel/Stop/Multi-Thread,the sample name is CSMultiThreadedWebDownloader and CSWebDownloader.If we have no additional features about it, I am afraid I can't persuade our experts approve this sample idea,so you'd better providing more scenario about its extend features. Thanks in advanced.

Sincerely,
All-In-Onecode Framework

Sample application that manages multiple segmented downloads and supports HTTP, FTP  downloads,Auto-Downloads,Internet Explorer Integration and showing download information like: file name,file size,progress,time left,... in dgv

Hi aaaaa,
  I have got your information. What you provided is useful for me,it seems that I can focus on Multi-Task to design this sample idea. Would you please give me more information about its detailed technologies points such as MVP 's blog articles or other some kb articles. I believe refining from these articles can make more clear the brain to understand its features and describe it more comprehensive,so that the SMEs will approve it immediately when I  complete its contents and submit it to Subject Matter Experts.Thanks in advanced.

Sincerely,
All-In-Onecode-Framework
